metaData.description: {"id": "bos_labour_shortages", "title": "Bank of Canada: Business Outlook Survey - Labour Shortages", "description": "Bank of Canada quarterly survey measuring the share of firms reporting labour shortages that restrict their ability to meet demand, by region, sector, and firm size.", "column_descriptions": {"date": "Observation date", "atlantic": "Pct of Atlantic region firms reporting labour shortages restricting ability to meet demand", "quebec": "Pct of Quebec firms reporting labour shortages restricting ability to meet demand", "ontario": "Pct of Ontario firms reporting labour shortages restricting ability to meet demand", "prairies": "Pct of Prairie firms (AB, SK, MB) reporting labour shortages restricting operations", "british_columbia": "Pct of BC firms reporting labour shortages restricting ability to meet demand", "sector_primary": "Pct of primary sector firms (agriculture, mining, forestry) with labour shortages", "sector_manufacturing": "Pct of manufacturing firms reporting labour shortages", "sector_citu": "Pct of construction/IT/utilities firms with labour shortages", "sector_trade": "Pct of wholesale and retail trade firms with labour shortages", "sector_fire": "Pct of finance/insurance/real estate firms with labour shortages", "sector_cpbs": "Pct of commercial/professional business services firms with labour shortages", "firm_small": "Pct of small firms (<100 employees) reporting labour shortages", "firm_medium": "Pct of medium firms (100-499 employees) reporting labour shortages", "firm_large": "Pct of large firms (500+ employees) reporting labour shortages"}}
